name: Wobbuffet
author: sui
flavor_text: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to build up its counterstrike.

abilities.name: Bide Barricade
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, each Pokémon in play, in each player’s hand, and in each player’s discard pile has no Abilities (except for {P} Pokémon).

attacks.name: Psychic Assault
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
